title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.9 - Types of licenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.9 - Types of licenses

State Regulations
(a) Licenses issued by the superintendent will be for carry and possession of a
firearm. (b) No license shall be
issued for gunsmiths or dealers in firearms. Retired members seeking gunsmith
or dealer licenses must apply to their local authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
